actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 as amended by designating portions of the Elk River, Colorado and the Encampment River, Colorado.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate as components of the national wild and scenic rivers system portions of the Elk River and of the Encampment River, both in Colorado.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 as amended by designating portions of the Elk River, Colorado and the Encampment River, Colorado.
